item.description:
WHEN: May 17th at 7:30

WHERE: Back-Room at BAR

WHY: Support Amanda O's 1/2 Marathon for Leukemia & Lymphoma Society


DONATION: $10 per person

Come out to BAR on Crown Street in Downtown New Haven for a night of fun and charity! We have the BACK ROOM RESERVED just for us! There will be great door prizes, raffles, martini specials and pizza! Proceeds from the evening will go to benefit Leukemia & Lyphoma Society for blood cancer research.



Any questions about the run or the cause? Check out my personal website..... http://www.active.com...



Raffles include gift certificates from Thali, Kudeta, Firehouse 12, Anna Liffey's, Cold Stone Creamery, Jet Cleaners, Lucibello's, Splash Car Wash, artwork from local artists (including our very own Michelle Reynard and Rich Rodriguez), goodie bags from the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society, and much, much more!! Everyone goes home a winner!!

Drawings will be held at 8:15, 9:00 and 9:45.

See you there!

Contact: Amanda O. - 203-823-5332
item.name: NHC VIP PARTY -- BAR EXTRAVAGANZA
